column3: Color is a Japanese manga anthology written and illustrated by Taishi Zaou and Eiki Eiki. Color was serialized in Dear+
column4: a magazine known for its romantic and non-explicit boys love manga published by Shinshokan
column5: [1] and a tank≈çbon collecting the chapters released in February 1999.[2] Color is licensed in North America by Digital Manga Publishing which released the manga in June 2009.[3] It is licensed in France by Asuka[4] and in Germany by Egmont Manga.[5]
